title: Trump Sues The INTERNET, NYPD Lures Kids With XBOX 7.8.21
itunes:title: Trump Sues The INTERNET, NYPD Lures Kids With XBOX 7.8.21
description:
In episode 946, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Derrick Lemos to discuss Trump suing social media, Trump voters complaining that no one wants to have sex with them, America inventing Indian Residential Schools, NYPD's game trucks that should be avoided at all costs, Sha'Carri Richardson, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Trump Joins Forces With a Cardi B-Hating Travel Agent to Take Down Big Tech
  2. Who's the Top MAGA Influencer Six Months After Trump Social Media Ban? A Newsweek Ranking
  3. National Review's Lament: No One Will F*ck Trump Voters
  4. You Can’t Spell “Indian Residential Schools” without “America”
  5. Why Cops Are Driving a ‘Game Truck’ Around New York City
  6. N.Y.P.D. Detectives Gave a Boy, 12, a Soda. He Landed in a DNA Database.
  7. She Was Arrested at 14. Then Her Photo Went to a Facial Recognition Database.
  8. NYPD Game Truck Wants Kids To Forget Cops Are Bastards
  9. NYPD's 'Shrek Bus' Is Fake, Not a Bus, and Should Be Avoided at All Costs
  10. Ex-NYPD cops accused of raping teen in police van dodge prison time with plea deal
  11. Sha'Carri Richardson won't run at Tokyo Olympics after being left off U.S. relay list
  12. LISTEN: Andrew Ashong & Theo Parrish - Flowers

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
